property_location: 200 Riverside Blvd Apt 14L, New York, NY 10069
property_description: Apt. 14L is a coveted, rarely available home that offers direct Hudson River views from all picturesque windows. Upon entering this gracious, western-facing unit, you're greeted by natural light flooding through the living room, kitchen, and separate dining area. Enjoy breathtaking sunset views from this 1,008 SF, 1-bedroom, 2-bathroom unit, which can be effortlessly converted into a two-bedroom layout or a private work-from-home office with minimal modifications. The desirable L-shaped living room features a separate dining area and a pass-through kitchen equipped with custom bamboo cabinetry, Basalto countertops, natural cleft slate tile floor, Viking stove, a refrigerator, a microwave, and a bonus sub-zero wine fridge. Marble bathrooms, an en-suite primary bathroom with limestone floor and countertop, a tub, a double vanity, and a separate stall shower. The guest bathroom boasts a standing shower and porcelain tile flooring. The apartment also features a washer and dryer! Throughout the apartment, you'll find gorgeous Tiete Chestnut wood floors with soundproofing, which, with their modern feel, high ceilings, light, and views, offer the perfect combination of functionality and aesthetics, as well as the calm, warm feeling of home! Building features include full service. The building features a 24-hour doorman, a health club with a swimming pool, a kids' playroom, a bicycle room, and an attached garage. The building is conveniently located on the Upper West Side of Manhattan, on West 70th Street and Riverside Blvd., nearby Lincoln Center and directly across the street from Riverside Park South and Pier 1. The building is pet-friendly.
